overview:
Geoff Cramer is the CEO and co-founder of SocialMadeSimple, and is responsible for the management and overall strategic direction of the company including product development, marketing and operations.

Prior to co-founding SocialMadeSimple, Geoff was the VP of Sales, Recruiting and Technology for 10 years at Century 21 The Howard Group, a residential real estate office in the Greater Boston area. He also spent time as President for C&R Development, a real estate development company devoted to creating socially and environmentally responsible homes in the Greater Boston area. Geoffâ€™s in-the-trenches experience provided him with deep insight into the real estate business, as well as the needs of both agents and consumers, and led him to develop SocialMadeSimple, an easy to use service that generates real results for the average real estate professional. He is frequently called to speak about social network marketing at leading industry events.
